constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 138 (Tuesday, August 23, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 8743.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H7720]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Labor, and the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Congress Leads by Example Act of 2022
